data.college_overview: NIET Business School, Greater Noida, managed by the City Educational and Welfare Society, caters to over 20,000 students and is run by a group of distinguished Doctors, Engineers, and Professionals. The Society was established with a vision to provide value-driven education of global standards. It manages several prestigious institutions, namely Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology (Pharmacy Institute), NIET Business School, Greater Noida, and City Vocational Public School (CVPS), Meerut. At NIET Business School, Greater Noida, we strive to shape future leaders by providing world-class education in management. Our Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) program is approved by AICTE and the Ministry of Education, Government of India, and is recognized as MBA equivalent by the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). The Institute offers dual specializations in Marketing, OB & Human Resource Management, Finance, Business Analytics, Supply Chain Management and Logistics, International Business & NexGen Startup & Entrepreneurship. We provide a comprehensive two-year, full-time program designed to combine academic learning with real-world industry experiences, preparing students to succeed in the global business arena.
